text: Are you all right?
Carl won the spelling bee and got a trophy!
What is it?
Hold on I need at least a few minutes!
I don't want to drink caffeine.
So what's the big hurry now?
Let's go to the beach.
Where are you going in such a big hurry?
Only time will tell.
Does she live in Paris?
Never do that again or I won't be your friend!
I brought you into this world so I can take you out!
Let’s go I'm sick of waiting!
How long did it take?
Don't go there!
Is it yours ?That's neat?
Tom stood alone under a big clock in the deserted train station.
How beautiful she is!
I messed up big time.
What a big dog!
Are you ready for your big date?
Will you come over now?
He never wants to go on a rollercoaster again!
He threw up in the trash can!
How beautiful she is!
Tom is in big trouble.
This car is in good condition.
I wish I had met my uncle yesterday.
Come on down!
You are so disgraceful I can't even believe it!
Carl won the spelling bee and got a trophy!
You want to grow up to be big and strong like Tom, don't you?
Do you mind waiting an extra hour so I can read more of my book?
Shut up already, I am speaking!
Don’t worry about it!
I have seen the real you.
Good morning!
What should you do if you find a big spider on your bed?
Thank you for finishing the last slice of pizza!
Do you mind if I smoke?
Do you have any big plans for the weekend?
If you could live anywhere, where would you live and why?
Good morning!
